item.title: Raichurâ€“Kurnool inter-state road a nightmare for farmers
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Farmers and local residents are facing severe hardships due to the deplorable condition of a two-kilometre stretch of the inter-state road connecting Raichur and Kurnool, particularly between Mittadoddi and Baligera villages.
The road, which serves as a crucial link for agricultural transport and daily travel, has turned into a major obstacle for farmers over the past two years.
Raising serious concerns over the prolonged neglect of this road, Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) Gadwal Constitue...]]>
item.author: The Hans India, Big Story
